lics.ref: Work by Giellatekno at UiT, Divvun at the Norwegian Saami Parliament, and members of the language communities. Source code available at https://victorio.uit.no/langtech/trunk/.
lics.sourcenote: THIS TEXT IS A **COPY** OF THE ORIGINAL SOURCE CODE. This is NOT a fully styled and published dictionary. As such it can and will contain unfinished entries, unpublished entries, entries with objectionable translations, etc. If you find any errors or want to add more words, download the file, edit it, and send it back to mailto:divvun@samediggi.no and mailto:giellatekno@hum.uit.no. Please also note that the entries are sorted using NORWEGIAN sorting order, which is incorrect. It is nevertheless the probably the best sorting for SÃ¡mi dictionaries at the moment, using modern and standard software.
